About Us

We use vegetable formulations to strengthen your body to fight different disease conditions.

jumbotrons.title: Our Product and Mission
jumbotrons.desc: A vegetable capsule a day  for a 'fit' state of health. An Effortless way to stay Healthy.

items.desc: Young and energetic was developed over 10 years of research on learning to balance the body through using dietetic principles. For patients with acidic disease conditions vegetables that enhance alkalinity are formulated to a daily dosage. For sleep fruits that balances circadian rhythm are formulated and for stress multiple dietetic sources that balances the body’s homeostasis are formulated. Using the same principle as of nature we use simple dietetics to carefully balance the human body.

With 9 Products and promising Health Benefits Y & E stands ahead of the existing commercial products. It resolves most of the common day to day problems from Sleep disorder, in digestion, inactivity, low energy also it enhances the beauty from within.
